entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Really, a great job? What a joke! 2,332,056 Covid19 cases, 122,020 deaths. Europe has flattened their curve while ours goes up.  @Mike_Pence lies as well as Trump.
